issue.title: [JS] Remove @std/esm
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3560](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3560). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When I run npm install, I get this warning:

@std/esm@0.26.0: This package is discontinued. Use https://npmjs.com/esm

comments.body:
